items.content_html: SpeedSketch is a lightweight canvas drawing tool with undo/redo functionality, color customization, and adjustable line thickness. It's designed for smooth performance and a minimalist UI, making it easy to sketch and prototype while keeping the app lightweight.
items.title: Unyime94/speed-sketch: SpeedSketch is a lightweight canvas drawing tool with undo/redo functionality, color customization, and adjustable line thickness. It's designed for smooth performance and a minimalist UI, making it easy to sketch and prototype while keeping the app lightweight.

items.content_html: A cross-platform chat application built with Tauri, designed to be a minimalist, high-performance, and lightweight alternative to Discord. Optimized for speed and simplicity, it delivers a smooth and responsive user experience without compromising on functionality.
